title: OCE is Best Place 5v5 Tournament II [Updated]

embed.description: Â© 2016 Riot Games, Inc. All rights reserved. Riot Games, League of Legends and PvP.net are trademarks, services marks, or registered trademarks of Riot Games, Inc.

body:
Since a bug stopped the registration date being extended (and therefore anyone getting prizes) I've had to create a new event. This means everyone has to register on the event page again (but since you know how it should be easy). Click here: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/178229

{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}{{champion:201}}

After the first OCE is Best Place 5v5 tournament turned out to be super duper hype it's time to raise the stakes - more prizes, more teams, more glory.

---
***General Information***

**Date:** Sunday 28th February 2016
**Start Time:** 2:00PM AEDT
**Chatroom Check In:** Between 9am-2pm (at least one team member must represent the team)
**Chatroom:** OCE is Best Place
**Tournament Mode:** Single Elimination
**No. of Teams:** 16
**Run Time:** Until all matches are completed
**Seeding:** Random
**Streaming:** Semifinals onwards will be streamed @ www.twitch.tv/nijiiyo
**More Rules:** Available on Challonge and the Facebook event page.
---
***Prizes*** (for each player)

**1st Place** - 1600RP, Ryze, Triumphant Ryze, 4-Win IP Boost
**2nd Place** - 1200RP, 4-Win IP Boost
**3rd Place** - 800RP, 4-Win IP Boost
**4th Place** - 400 RP, 4-Win IP Boost
**5th - 8th** - 4-Win IP Boost
---
***To Register***

If you are part of a team interested in playing, follow these steps:

1. EVERY PLAYER must register on this Event Page by clicking the “Register” button below. This is to ensure you are eligible for Riot prizes. Register on this page and then send the link to all of your teammates and substitutes so they can register: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/178229
2. THE CAPTAIN must register their team to the tournament on Challonge. Within the description box they must write the summoner names and positions of every team member and up to three substitutes. Rosters may be changed up until your first match starts. http://oce-is-best-place.challonge.com/tournaments/signup/3nOg7gwU1q
3. THE CAPTAIN must add Nijiiyo in game to have a direct point of contact for when they have questions (and you most likely will have questions).
4. Show up on the day and play.

replies.body:
Congrats to Fusion eSports who took the crown! 

Thanks to everyone who watched and played too!
if any one needs  sub i don't think ill be up to much tmoz

The final few spots of the bracket keep getting filled up by teams who are not registering any players to the event page (which is step 1 and compulsory). I'll give these teams one day before removing them from the bracket and messaging them on challonge to properly register. This is only fair to the teams who are more seriously prepared to follow instructions.

To be exact there are 5 more slots.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

All teams who have not registered on the new event page are now being removed from the challonge bracket. This is to free up slots for those who might actually be ready to play. I'll be messaging captains.

THIS MEANS THERE ARE FREE SLOTS FOR YOUR TEAM TO STILL REGISTER
